content.p: The form of an action for words may be as follows: IN THE ______ COURT OF ______ COUNTY STATE OF GEORGIA A.B., ) Plaintiff ) ) v. ) Civil action ) File no. ______ C.D., ) (Clerk will insert Defendant ) number.) COMPLAINT The defendant herein named is a resident of ____________ (street), ______ (city), ______ County, Georgia, and is subject to the jurisdiction of this court. Defendant C.D. has injured and damaged plaintiff in the sum of $____, by falsely and maliciously saying of and concerning plaintiff, on the ______ day of ______, ____, the following false and malicious words to ______ (name of person): (here give the words). Wherefore, plaintiff demands judgment against defendant (here list the relief prayed for). __________________________ Attorney for plaintiff __________________________ Address
